Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.network

Class Server

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.Server
public class Server
extends java.lang.Object
Server that handle all the connection logic between players.

  • Constructor Details

    • Server

      public Server​(java.net.InetAddress ip, int port) throws java.io.IOException
      Constructor of Server.
      Parameters:
      ip - The IP needed to create the ServerSocket.
      port - The PORT needed to create the ServerSocket.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - Is thrown if an I/O error occurs when opening the socket.

    • Server

      public Server() throws java.io.IOException
      Constructor of Server on localhost and default port.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - Is thrown if an I/O error occurs when opening the socket.

  • Method Details

    • deregisterConnection

      public void deregisterConnection​(java.lang.String nick)
      Deregister a client when is no longer reachable. If is one game, other players will be disconnected too.
      Parameters:
      nick - Client unique name.

    • run

      public void run()
      It keeps the server listening on PORT and it accepts new client.

    • getNicknameDatabase

      public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getNicknameDatabase()

    • addNickname

      public void addNickname​(java.lang.String nickname)

    • getWaitingConnection

      public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​SocketConnection> getWaitingConnection()

    • noPlayerChecker

      public boolean noPlayerChecker​(java.lang.String s)
      Check if the input string about number of player is legal.
      Parameters:
      s - String from user input that must be checked.
      Returns:
      true if it is 2 or 3 otherwise false.

    • lobby

      public void lobby​(java.lang.String nickname, java.util.Date playerBirthday, SocketConnection c)
      Waiting room for new client.
      Parameters:
      nickname - is the player's nickname.
      playerBirthday - is the player's birthday.
      c - is the player's socket connection.

    • gameLobby

      public void gameLobby()
      Called when all player for a game are ready and check for a new game creator.

    • checkNewCreator

      private void checkNewCreator()
      Check for a new game creator in the waiting list.

    • creatorSetup

      private void creatorSetup​(SocketConnection c)
      Handle the input to receive the number of player.
      Parameters:
      c - The SocketConnection of the creator.

    • gameSettings

      private void gameSettings​(Game gameInstance, java.util.ArrayList<Player> usersReadyCopy, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​SocketConnection> waitingConnectionCopy)
      Setting game observer/observable and start the game.
      Parameters:
      gameInstance - The new game instance.
      usersReadyCopy - ArrayList of user ready to initiate the game.
      waitingConnectionCopy - List of the ready user's connection.

    • deregisterOnePlayer

      public void deregisterOnePlayer​(java.lang.String nickname)
      Deregister a client when he sent a QUIT and alert the other player that the game is ended.
      Parameters:
      nickname - The nickname of the player to disconnect from the game.
